T02TD1805E:112a-1: sv'a dhi shth'a na kra ma pra bhe dam /
T02TD1805E:112a-3: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnam par dbye ba /
T02TD1805E:112a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1805E:112a-5: lta ba thams cad rab bcom pa'i //
T02TD1805E:112a-6: ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1805E:112a-7: bdag byin brlab pa'i rnam dbye 'di //
T02TD1805E:112a-8: brtse bas bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1805E:112a-9: yod ces rtog pa ji snyed pa //
T02TD1805E:112a-10: de snyed rtag pa'i lta ba ste //
T02TD1805E:112a-11: rtag par mngon par zhen pas na //
T02TD1805E:112a-12: 'di ni sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD1805E:112a-13: med ces rtog pa ji snyed pa //
T02TD1805E:112a-14: de snyed chad pa'i lta ba ste //
T02TD1805E:112a-15: chad par mngon par zhen pas na //
T02TD1805E:112a-16: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD1805E:112a-17: yod ces pa dang med ces pa'i //
T02TD1805E:112a-18: de dbus su gang rtog pa ni //
T02TD1805E:112a-19: dbus su mngon par zhen pas na //
T02TD1805E:112a-20: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02TD1805E:112a-21: kun rdzob bden par gang gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1805E:112a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku mtshan nyid //
T02TD1805E:112a-23: de 'dir sgyu mar bstan pa ste //
T02TD1805E:112a-24: bdag byin brlab pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD1805E:112a-25: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum //
T02TD1805E:112a-26: gang zhig gis ni thams cad khyab //
T02TD1805E:112a-27: bsod nams dman pas mi rnyed de //
T02TD1805E:112a-28: lung bstan nyid kyis rnyed par 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112a-29: gtsang spra sdom pa 'dir mi dgos //
T02TD1805E:112a-30: dka' thub dka' spyad mi dgos te //
T02TD1805E:112a-31: dka' thub sdom pa med par yang //
T02TD1805E:112a-33: gang zhig de ltar shes nas ni //
T02TD1805E:112a-34: de nyid gang zhig rtag dran na //
T02TD1805E:112a-35: thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis //
T02TD1805E:112a-37: sgyu mas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1805E:112a-38: 'di la lhas kyang rtag tu skyong //
T02TD1805E:112b-0: @112b sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1805E:112b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa de nas 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112b-2: rdo rje che dang stobs po che //
T02TD1805E:112b-3: lang tsho nad med bde ba'i mchog / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob nas ni //
T02TD1805E:112b-4: skye ba 'byung ba rang dags so //
T02TD1805E:112b-5: mthong ba nyid kyis bskul med par //
T02TD1805E:112b-6: sems can rnams ni dbang du 'ong //
T02TD1805E:112b-8: / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1805E:112b-10: chos kun rmi lam sgyu 'dra ste //
T02TD1805E:112b-11: sangs rgyas pa kun smra mod kyi //
T02TD1805E:112b-12: bdag byin brlab las phyir bltas pas //
T02TD1805E:112b-13: des ni bden pa mthong mi nus //
T02TD1805E:112b-14: gzhu yi rnam pa'i yid rang bzhin //
T02TD1805E:112b-15: rnam shes rlung dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1805E:112b-16: sgyu ma'i dpe la rmongs pas ni //
T02TD1805E:112b-17: rang gi ye shes des mi mthong //
T02TD1805E:112b-18: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par //
T02TD1805E:112b-19: thos pa'i pha rol son gyur kyang //
T02TD1805E:112b-20: bla ma'i lung dang bral ba yis //
T02TD1805E:112b-21: bdag byin brlab pa rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112b-22: de bas nga rgyal yongs spangs nas //
T02TD1805E:112b-24: rdo rje theg pa zhon pa yis //
T02TD1805E:112b-25: bla ma bsgrims te mnyes par bya //
T02TD1805E:112b-26: shin tu rnyed dka'i rim dbye bas //
T02TD1805E:112b-27: 'di ni rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD1805E:112b-28: gang zhig shes nas rnam spyad pa //
T02TD1805E:112b-29: sgrub po sangs rgyas kun dngos 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112b-30: sa la sogs pa rnam bzhi dang //
T02TD1805E:112b-31: de bzhin du ni stong pa bzhi //
T02TD1805E:112b-32: gnas ni rnam pa brgyad po dang //
T02TD1805E:112b-33: skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyur shes bya //
T02TD1805E:112b-34: 'od gsal las ni stong chen te //
T02TD1805E:112b-35: de la thabs ni yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1805E:112b-36: de las skyes pa shes rab te //
T02TD1805E:112b-38: rlung las me ni yang dag skyes //
T02TD1805E:112b-40: chu las skyes pa sa yin te //
T02TD1805E:112b-41: de rnams la ni sems can 'byung //
T02TD1805E:112b-42: sa ni chu la thim 'gyur te //
T02TD1805E:112b-43: chu ni me la thim par 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112b-44: me ni phra ba'i khams su zhugs //
T02TD1805E:112b-45: rlung yang sems la thim 'gyur te //
T02TD1805E:112b-46: sems ni sems las byung las 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:112b-47: sems byung ma rig par zhugs nas //
T02TD1805E:112b-48: de yang 'od gsal bar song ste //
T02TD1805E:112b-50: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1805E:112b-51: ji srid bdag nyid ma mthong ba //
T02TD1805E:112b-52: de srid thog ma'i dus can gyi //
T02TD1805E:112b-54: rang rig sgyu ma lta bu ste //
T02TD1805E:113a-2: rang gi lus la gnas mod kyi //
T02TD1805E:113a-3: bsod nams dman pas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:113a-4: rang lus 'gyur ba med pa de //
T02TD1805E:113a-5: mchog gcig gis ni shes byas te //
T02TD1805E:113a-6: de ni dpe yis nyer mtshon nas //
T02TD1805E:113a-7: bla ma'i zhal gyi drin gyis so //
T02TD1805E:113a-8: sa dang de bzhin chu la sogs //
T02TD1805E:113a-9: gter dang nor bu sbas pa ltar //
T02TD1805E:113a-10: de bzhin lus la kun mkhyen pa'ang //
T02TD1805E:113a-11: rmongs dang ldan pas mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD1805E:113a-12: sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi //
T02TD1805E:113a-13: grong khyer dang ni brgya byin gzhu //
T02TD1805E:113a-14: me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-15: chu zla dang ni brag ca dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-16: rmi lam mig yor sprin dang glog /
T02TD1805E:113a-17: chu yi chu bur zhes bya ba //
T02TD1805E:113a-18: sgyu ma'i dpe ni bcu dang gnyis //
T02TD1805E:113a-19: rnam pa du mar yongs mtshon pa //
T02TD1805E:113a-20: des 'di shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1805E:113a-21: lta ba'i gzugs la dmigs par byed //
T02TD1805E:113a-22: sgyu ma gsum du bstan pa yis //
T02TD1805E:113a-23: nan tan du ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1805E:113a-24: me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-25: 'ja' tshon dang ni de las gzhan //
T02TD1805E:113a-26: gsum pa chu zla lta bu yis //
T02TD1805E:113a-27: de yi sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1805E:113a-28: spyod pa bsdus las gang bstan pa'i //
T02TD1805E:113a-29: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid che //
T02TD1805E:113a-30: lha dang lha mo tha dad pa //
T02TD1805E:113a-31: rigs lnga las ni yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1805E:113a-32: khro bo pho nya pho nya mo //
T02TD1805E:113a-33: bran pho bran mo mngag pa sogs //
T02TD1805E:113a-34: de ni yod min de med kyang //
T02TD1805E:113a-35: 'gro ba'i don phyir rab tu bstan //
T02TD1805E:113a-36: de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1805E:113a-37: thams cad spro zhing bsdus pas te //
T02TD1805E:113a-38: dkyil 'khor tshul ni rab tu rgyas pa'ang //
T02TD1805E:113a-39: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD1805E:113a-40: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog kyang //
T02TD1805E:113a-41: sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sbyar //
T02TD1805E:113a-42: mya ngan 'jigs dang chags bral dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-43: skrag dang de bzhin rmongs pa dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-44: sdug bsngal ba de yod min pas //
T02TD1805E:113a-45: de bzhin mi sdug mthong thos dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-46: yid du mi 'ong dri ro dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-47: reg bya rtsub sogs gang gyur pa //
T02TD1805E:113a-48: tshul dang mi mthun rang bzhin rnams //
T02TD1805E:113a-49: sgyu ma lta bus dag par bya //
T02TD1805E:113a-50: bshad dang gci sogs 'jug pa dang //
T02TD1805E:113a-51: grang dang rims sogs nad dang ni //
T02TD1805E:113a-52: rgas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams //
T02TD1805E:113a-53: de rnams sgyu ma'i sman gyis gso //
T02TD1805E:113a-54: chos gang gis ni byis pa rnams //
T02TD1805E:113b-0: chos de nyid kyis rnal @113b 'byor pa //
T02TD1805E:113b-1: bde ba chen po'i gnas la 'jug //
T02TD1805E:113b-2: 'dod yon lnga yi bde ba yis //
T02TD1805E:113b-3: byis pa rnams ni 'ching brjod de //
T02TD1805E:113b-4: chos de nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1805E:113b-6: chags dang rgyags dang sred pa dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-7: de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-9: / dga' dang btang snyoms nyid dang ni //
T02TD1805E:113b-10: stobs dang de bzhin spro ba dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-11: dpa' dang mi srun gdug pa dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-12: drag shul de bzhin dka' bar sbyor //
T02TD1805E:113b-13: snang ba'i rang bzhin gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD1805E:113b-14: bdag byin brlab pa'i bden pas bsdu //
T02TD1805E:113b-15: phyag rgya gcig dang ldan pa'am //
T02TD1805E:113b-16: yang na phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan //
T02TD1805E:113b-17: btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pas kyang //
T02TD1805E:113b-18: bdag byin brlab pa rjes dran bya //
T02TD1805E:113b-19: gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri //
T02TD1805E:113b-20: ro dang reg bya sdug pa rnams //
T02TD1805E:113b-21: bde chen go 'phang gnas nas kyang //
T02TD1805E:113b-22: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu myong //
T02TD1805E:113b-23: rgyud mangs dang ni rgyud gcig dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-24: stug pa dang ni gling bu nyid //
T02TD1805E:113b-25: rol mo rnam bzhi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1805E:113b-26: bdag byin brlab pas rab tu 'jug / rtag tu sgeg la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1805E:113b-27: gar gyi ro dgur yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1805E:113b-28: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1805E:113b-29: rnal 'byor pa yi longs spyod bya //
T02TD1805E:113b-30: rnal 'byor rgyud las gang gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1805E:113b-31: brda sogs cho ga rgyas pa dag / sgyu ma lta bur dmigs pa yis //
T02TD1805E:113b-32: rnal 'byor pas ni de la 'jug /'byed pa dang ni 'dzums pa dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-33: dgod dam de bzhin smra ba dang //
T02TD1805E:113b-35: sgyu ma'i lus su dran par bya //
T02TD1805E:113b-36: sna tshogs rtog pas brtags pa yi //
T02TD1805E:113b-37: 'gro ba'i bdag pos rol pa gang //
T02TD1805E:113b-38: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gnas nas //
T02TD1805E:113b-39: de nyid rig pas rnam par spyad //
T02TD1805E:113b-40: lta ba thams cad spangs pa yi //
T02TD1805E:113b-41: bdag byin brlab pa 'di thos nas //
T02TD1805E:113b-42: las rnams thams cad bya ba'am //
T02TD1805E:113b-43: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu //
T02TD1805E:113b-44: mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing //
T02TD1805E:113b-45: glegs bam bklag par mi bya ste //
T02TD1805E:113b-46: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis kyang //
T02TD1805E:113b-47: bya ba dang ni bklag pa'ang bya //
T02TD1805E:113b-48: lha la 'dud par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1805E:113b-49: dge slong rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02TD1805E:113b-50: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim nyid kyis //
T02TD1805E:113b-51: yang na kun la phyag bya'o //
T02TD1805E:113b-52: sngags dgod pa ni mi bya zhing//
T02TD1805E:114a-0: @114a * // phyag rgya 'chang ba'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1805E:114a-1: sngags kyi bzlas brjod mi bya ste //
T02TD1805E:114a-2: yang na gzugs brnyan ldan par bya //
T02TD1805E:114a-3: phyi rol don ni yod min pas //
T02TD1805E:114a-4: 'di dag rang gi sems su blta //
T02TD1805E:114a-5: de bzhin sgyu mar bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1805E:114a-6: de nyid kyang ni rjes dran bya //
T02TD1805E:114a-7: bsam gtan cho ga dpag med dang //
T02TD1805E:114a-8: sngags kyi sku yi ting 'dzin rnams //
T02TD1805E:114a-9: ji srid sgyu ma rnyed med na //
T02TD1805E:114a-10: kun kyang sa yi 'bras don tsam //
T02TD1805E:114a-11: lus dang gnas dang longs spyod dang //
T02TD1805E:114a-12: sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD1805E:114a-13: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam rol pa //
T02TD1805E:114a-14: thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul yin ;
T02TD1805E:114a-15: / ji ltar me long dri ma med pa la //
T02TD1805E:114a-16: yan lag kun dang ldan gzugs snang ba ltar //
T02TD1805E:114a-17: dpe byad brgyad cu mtshan chen sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1805E:114a-18: de bzhin rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin lus nyid //
T02TD1805E:114a-19: mkha' dbyings dbang po'i mtshon cha kha dog snang ba ltar //
T02TD1805E:114a-20: de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang kha dog dkar po la sogs pas //
T02TD1805E:114a-21: dge sogs las rnams ji bzhin de bzhin du ni 'jig rten la //
T02TD1805E:114a-22: yan lag ma nyams phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs ni ston par mdzad //
T02TD1805E:114a-23: gang zhig gser dngul dang ni nor bu dung dang shel bye ru //
T02TD1805E:114a-24: bee d'urya dang zangs dang 'jon mo steng sogs yang dag gnas//
T02TD1805E:114a-25: nam mkha'i ngos nas ri bong can gyi gzugs ni gcig shar bas //
T02TD1805E:114a-26: de la rnam par 'jug pas shin tu gsal bar gang byas ltar //
T02TD1805E:114a-27: rang dngos sna tshogs gzugs can zag med gang //
T02TD1805E:114a-28: 'jig rten kun khyab sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1805E:114a-29: rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro ba'i sder gnas pa'i //
T02TD1805E:114a-30: sems mgon rdo rje de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1805E:114a-31: gzugs sogs rnam pa lnga dang gang yang skye mched rnams de nas //
T02TD1805E:114a-32: bco brgyad ces byar gsungs dang khams ni rnam pa lnga dang yang //
T02TD1805E:114a-33: ye shes lnga po dang ni yul de 'gro ba ma lus kun //
T02TD1805E:114a-34: sgyu ma las byung de 'dir rdo rje 'dzin de gzhan ma yin //
T02TD1805E:114a-35: ri rnams dang ni rgya mtsho chen po brgyad gang yin //
T02TD1805E:114a-36: gling rnams dang ni dmyal ba la sogs dbye ba rnams //
T02TD1805E:114a-37: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba nyid gang yin pa //
T02TD1805E:114a-38: de de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin te gzhan min blta //
T02TD1805E:114a-39: de ltar 'gro ba ma lus rang gi sems las byung ba ste //
T02TD1805E:114b-0: srid dang thar pa rtog dang yang @114b dag ldan pa'i rnam par shes //
T02TD1805E:114b-1: gang gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal rgya mtshor 'khor 'gyur las //
T02TD1805E:114b-2: legs sbyangs pha rol son pa'i 'bras ldan de la bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1805E:114b-3: slob dpon chen po a'arya de bas mdzad pa'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rdzogs so /
